name: kbjs
description: A simple Knowledge Base CMS written in JavaScript

scripts.fix-perms: npm run fix-perms-prod && npm run fix-perms-qa
scripts.fix-perms-prod: chown -R nginx:nginx /var/www/site && find /var/www/site -type d | grep -v "\.git" | xargs -n 1 chmod 775
scripts.fix-perms-qa: chown -R nginx:nginx /var/www/site-qa && find /var/www/site-qa -type d | grep -v "\.git" | xargs -n 1 chmod 775

author: Silvestre Herrera
